comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.body: How to participate?1. download desktop version of Utopia client: https://u.is/en/download.html2. to apply share here your Utopia Public Key or uNS Name 3. I will send DM to provided Public Key using Utopia uMessenger or uMail to verify/confirm every participant,4. reply in Utopia (uMessenger or uMail) and get 8CRP (5$) To check Utopia poker client5. play few hands, come back and write review (100 words minimum) about Utopia poker client, let's discuss the pros and cons,6. after review I will send reward in Uvoucher (CRP - 10$)PSMobile version doesn't support poker yetmy Utopia Public Key: 8AA5420496ACD8021D9C018693777C70F06FC27C6C3C2592BA1075024E3AC23Dmy uNS - emoneyabc
